channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 4/2/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated DNC keywords for Spanish. Fixed missing plan title issue in the pricing section. Enhanced outbound and inbound calling via dialpad. Improved outbound call functionality via AI Agent. 3/27/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated “Keywords and Auto-replies” to support WhatsApp messages. Fixed an issue with DNC keywords. Updated chatbot bubble title. Added product chatbot to the landing page. 3/20/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed the application process and procedure for purchasing numbers.
